definition: abbr. for 歐洲共同體|欧洲共同体, European Community (old term for the EU, European Union)
(used for transliteration)/old variant of 謳|讴[ou1]
Europe/abbr. for 歐洲|欧洲[Ou1 zhou1]/surname Ou
common/general/to share/together/total/altogether/abbr. for 共產黨|共产党[Gong4 chan3 dang3], Communist party

sentences.english: The EC only has nine people here and there is a limit to what we can do.
sentences.chinese: 歐共體只有九個人在這裏工作，我們所能做的很有限。

sentences.english: He has also managed to unite the British parliament and the European Union in support of his proposals.
sentences.chinese: 他也設法得了到英國國會和歐共體的支持。

sentences.english: The notification document can be obtained from the EC Enquiry Point.
sentences.chinese: 通報文件可從歐共體諮詢點獲取。

sentences.english: The European Economic and Monetary Union (EMU) originated from the acceptability of sovereignties in the European Community(EC).
sentences.chinese: 歐洲經貨聯盟源起於歐共體各主權國家的合意。

sentences.english: The EC is not paid by Pakistan, so I can be outspoken.
sentences.chinese: 由於巴基斯坦不向歐共體交錢，所以我可以直言不諱。

sentences.english: Finally, as part of this treaty, the EC reestablished itself as the European Union.
sentences.chinese: 最後，最爲該條約的一部分，歐共體重整爲歐盟。

sentences.english: The EC had no objections for the two cases to be merged.
sentences.chinese: 歐共體對兩案合併不持異議。

sentences.english: Improved the focusing accuracy when using the EC-20 Teleconverter.
sentences.chinese: 改進了對焦準確時，用歐共體20個鏡頭。

sentences.english: Europe all body includes main research to develop a field velar technology.
sentences.chinese: 歐共體把膜技術列入主要研究開發領域。

sentences.english: Europe in all body includes main research to develop a field velar technology.
sentences.chinese: 歐共體把膜技術列入主要研究開發領域。

sentences.english: A European-like trading club has developed in Asia.
sentences.chinese: 一個類似歐共體的貿易俱樂部正在亞洲形成。

sentences.english: The US referred to a similar case involving India and the EC and proposed both cases to be merged.
sentences.chinese: 美國提到印度與歐共體的類似案件，並建議兩案合併。

sentences.english: The cynical Eurocrat has seemingly been proved right.
sentences.chinese: 歐共體官員的冷嘲熱諷似乎已經得到了驗證。

sentences.english: The EC repeatedly blocked formation of a GATT panel.
sentences.chinese: 歐共體多次阻撓關貿總協定專家小組的組建。
